document.full_text: at&t's  rivals have asked u.s. regulators to combine a review of at&t's proposed purchase of t-mobile usa with their examination of its plan to buy wireless airwaves from qualcomm inc .
document.title: rivals seek joint review of at&t's deals
lines_and_colors: at&t's  rivals have asked u.s. regulators to combine a review of at&t's proposed purchase of t-mobile usa with their examination of its plan to buy wireless airwaves from qualcomm inc .
